channel.title: Imperica-PVP - A new look to PVP
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/impericalogo.jpg[/img] [B] Imperica-PVP is a PVP based Private server. We have great plans in the near future, we are going to have a $120 starting capital which we are planning on using to host/advertise. Imperica-PVP is not a Hybrid PVP V3 server, instead it's a Orical-X based Private Server. Our goal is to have amazing and exciting PvP zones which include both single and multi-player arenas, we are allowing players to experience a great and more up-to-date style of PVP'ing which include the availability to newer items in the modern runescape. The server has a PVP-DROP system where you are given 4 random drops for every player killed, the server has no intention in obligating players to donate, therefore we are giving every player the same exposure to every item available in the entire server. Imperica-PVP also offer tags for PKers who care about respect. For example, If you reach 1,000 kills you are given a yell tag of a "legendary PKer". You may also achieve a player title for example "veteran" if you over achieve. But that's not it!, Imperica-PVP has recently added loyalty titles for players who are dedicated to the game and continue to demonstrate their dedication to the server. [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/space-1.png[/img] [b]Want to join us? Please sign up, we would appreciate all the support![/b] [b]Server Sided Programmer [1/3][/b]
Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be:
[b]Client Sided Programmer [0/3][/b]
Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be:
[b]Media Artist [1/3][/b]
Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be:
[b]Webmaster [0/3][/b]
Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be:
[b]Moderator/Administrator [0/4][/b]
Name: Age: Why should I consider you (minimum 250 words): How active are you: Timezone:
[IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/space-1.png[/img] [b]UPDATED IMAGE To view in full size, go here: http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/picturesforimperica.jpg [/b] [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/picturesforimperica.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/space-1.png[/img] [b]Credits:[/b] - Sanity - Asshole_Rule - Myself ... Thread still under development. [b]For MORE information or if you are interested, you can contact me. via. MSN or Skype. MSN: imperica-pvp@hotmail.com Skype: luis.escamilla88[/b] [/CENTER]

item.title: Imperica-PVP - A new look to PVP
item.dc:creator: @Veela Veela
item.description:
@Veela wrote:

[center]Moderator / Admin Application!

Name: Owen

Age: 15

Why should I consider you (minimum 250 words): I have just recently resigned from an Admin position on a different server i have proof if you need it. I really want to help a different server again and help players. I understand alot about Runescape and played the real game for 3 years. I respect all of the owners choices and accept the rules placed against me. I do not abuse commands and only use them if necesarry. I fully understand the privilages of Admin and try to help players to my highest possibility. I belive i can help this server alot with advertising keeping the economy stable and all round helping the community!

How active are you: School Days: 7 Hours - Weekends: 14+ Hours

Timezone: GMT + 0:00 - U.K
[/center]

Read full topic

Name: sven
Age:16
*Years Of Experience: 4years
*Previous Work: As website www.deltacommanders.com as forum www.lgclan.net
Strengths: Finding fast problems or bugs and fixing them.
Weaknesses: Working longtime.
Contact Information: @msn svenquintens@hotmail.com or @ skype sven-quintens
How Active Will you be: Very active

Name: sven
Age:16
Why should I consider you (minimum 250 words): I know how to handle people when they break our rules. If they keep goind after i warned them they will get punished very hard. If someone gots questions about something in the server i will help them very fast. This means im helpfull. Im also always enable to fix problems in the coding or helping with it. Im online very much so the players can see me very much online so i can help them very much.
How active are you: Very active more then 2 hours a day and wednesday and in weekends more then 6hours a day
Timezone: GMT +1

item.title: Imperica-PVP - A new look to PVP
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[center]Server Programmer Application
Name:
Jordan Patterson

Age:
16 years of age. (March 1st is my birthday, so soon to be 17.)

*Years Of Experience:
2 - 2.5 years.

*Previous Work:
RevealedX, worked on some smaller servers, and I have been working on a blank PI source just for fun. Pictures can be sent via PM if needed.

Strengths:
Mini-games, dialogues, stability, as well as general programming.

Weaknesses:
Sometimes I get sidetracked fixing something while working on something else. ^^

Contact Information:
•MSN: jordan.patterson@live.com
•Yahoo: killingspartansince1995@yahoo.com

How Active Will you be:
The amount of time that I spend online depends on the days. Here’s a list of general activity.
•Weekdays (M-F): 4 hours a day
•Weekends (Sat-Sun): 4-12 hours a day.

Also available is my application for Server Moderator/Administrator.

Server Moderator/Administrator Application:
Name:
Jordan Patterson

Age:
16 years of age.

Why should I consider you (minimum 250 words):
I am a user who will be able to work well with other users, create simple as well as complex guides to help other users, manage the game well, create a clean and safe environment for all users, able to punish other users with a fairness that is expected, and not take preference. I am not new to RSPS’s as well as RSPS communities, so I know how they work. I have owned and operated many servers myself, but none that I really took a great liking to. I do not abuse my powers. I have a great grasp on the English language and I am always upfront and courteous. I am able to make suggestions without getting angry or upset when I don’t see things go my way. I am a very active user, and I would like to see this server grow. In my opinion, as well as many others, I am very mature compared to many of the 12 year old moderators that are out there. ^^ I would always be available for people to ask me questions, ask for advice, or to just talk if someone is having a bad day. I am not afraid of confrontation, so I would be able to handle any problems that would happen on the server. I am a very calm person, so I am able to defuse many situations that might explode into something that they really didn’t need to form into. I have great internet connection and only disconnect once a blue moon. I have a great computer with 2gbs of ram, and a terabyte of memory. I am able to search the web, post on the forums, talk on the chatbox, and help on the server if the situation arises where I am needed to.

How active are you:
The amount of time that I spend online depends on the days. Here’s a list of general activity.
•Weekdays (M-F): 4 hours a day minimum
•Weekends (Sat-Sun): 4-12 hours a day.

Timezone:
Central Standard Time (GMT-6)

I hope you consider me as a choice, and I thank you for reading my application.[/center]

Read full topic
